title: Temporal Convolutional Networks: A Unified Approach to Action Segmentation

tldr.text: This work proposes a unified approach, as demonstrated by the Temporal Convolutional Network (TCN), that hierarchically captures relationships at low-level time-scales, and can be trained in a fraction of the time it takes to train an RNN.
